title: So what can we do when one in our team is assisting the enemy team to win ?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Lee started to expose our positions at the start of the game, and guide the enemy team to get the FB, then he had been afk for the rest of the game! 
Now riot, what should we do ?
Does a report really solve this problem?
This kind of player, not only destroy the joy of the game but also wasted the other 4 ppl's time! Even if you ban his account, he'll come up with a new account and do the same thing!

replies.body:
There is only one possibility on why this situation even remotely occurred: someone on your team must have pissed him off. Badly. 
You often only see people grief when playing lol when provoked or stimulated due to the ever large pool of angsty teenagers and their raging hormones. Just make sure **you're** not the one stirring up the hornet's nest. At the end of the day, _you can only control your actions_. If more people take on this quality, we really wouldn't have any problems in the league community...
